A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People expect too much from a series that has always been based on pulp tropes. It's *supposed* to be kind of goofy and imperfect. The Japanese call that \"wabi-sabi.\" The Italians call it \"sprezzatura.\" The best parts of this entry must be included with the very best parts of the series. No exaggeration. I loved it.
